attributes.action:
To clearly label, 
(Halal) 
(ritually slaughtered) 
meat and meat products.
attributes.additional_details:
Whilst I understand that certain religious groups require 
ritually slaughtered meat, 
I do not agree that (Halal) should be added to the food chain of the British public, including schools and colleges, without their knowledge.
This may suit big business profits, but I and many others would prefer to buy meat thats been ethically killed, there is also a large amount of British consumers, concerned with animal welfare issues.
all I am demanding is clear labeling, on all Halal products.
attributes.background:
(Halal) meat 
Ritually slaughtered meat is routinely sold in British supermarkets, pizza outlets, fried chicken outlets, takeaways, to an uninformed British consumer, 
without a clear labeling system. 
This is wrong I would advocate a clear 
instantly recognizable signage system.
